card_text: Once per turn, if this card would be destroyed by battle, you can banish 1 Trap from your GY instead. You can banish up to 3 Traps from your GY; apply this effect, based on the number banished.$N●1: Draw 1 card, then place 1 card from your hand on top of the Deck.$N●2: Draw 1 card.$N●3: Draw 2 cards, then discard 1 card.$NYou can only use this effect of "Dark Eye Nightmare" once per turn.
